metadata.title: CVE-2020-36557 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition in the Linux kernel before 5.6.2 between theVT_DISALLOCATE ioctl and closing/opening of ttys could lead to ause-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36557` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-179.209
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-179.209
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-179.209
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
